Release Notes:
--------------
This box set contains three CDs and one DVD. This release contains the
three CDs, with the DVD coming separately.

Disc 1 is the legendary debut album of Yazoo: "Upstairs At Eric&#039;s".
Disc 2 is the legendary final album of Yazoo: "You And Me Both".
Disc 3 is a collection of b-sides and remixes compiled exclusively for
this boxset.

Both the complete albums have been remastered by renowned mastering
engineer Simon Heyworth, and are also available on their own, outside
this box.
